summary: HAD REC'D RECALL (93V028000) FOR THE REAR SPRING MOUNTS WHICH HAD FAILED BECAUSE OF WEAK WELDING DESIGN ON RIGHT SIDE SUSPENSION. THE LEFT REAR AXLE HAD CRACKS SHOWN ABOVE TIRE. THE METAL PIECE WAS BOLTED, TWISTED AND SHOWS CRACKS.    DEALERSHIP: COLORADO CHASSIS INC. COMMERCE CITY CO   303 292 9559 (DAN GRAY) RECALL #93V028000. TS
